# Remove Visible Apps from a User

**Web Service Endpoint**

Remove a user on your team’s access to one or more apps.

## Listing, Adding, and Removing App Access

- **List All Apps Visible to a User**: Get a list of apps that a user on your team can view.
- **Get All Visible App Resource IDs for a User**: Get a list of app resource IDs to which a user on your team has access.
- **Add Visible Apps to a User**: Give a user on your team access to one or more apps.
- **Replace the List of Visible Apps for a User**: Replace the list of apps a user on your team can see.
